Alphah::

"well" said Alpha's spark "I'm new too... but let's go we must to 
find all things that you need... Perhaps we can find a blank 
Protophorm and that will help"

Alpha woke up and stoond up, she started to walk looking to the 
control room.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> AzureBlade:
> Thank you, but no. I do not need to do so. The help I need is to 
get 
> me in another body. I must build another one. You know the place 
> better than I do. That is why I wish to have your assistance.
>

> > Alpha::
> > 
> > "Agree"said Alpha "If you like you can take control of my body a

Starscream's.
